![Wukong Brook 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ac/Wukong_Brook_11.jpg)
When you reach a cliff with some braziers, look down to find a spot to drop into a large open cave with a large Buddha Statue.
img_below_text:
As you approach, the Treasure Hunter will reveal his true form and attack!
## Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character approaching a large Buddha statue inside a dimly lit cave. This setting is reached after dropping from a cliff with braziers, as part of the walkthrough. The area appears to precede an encounter with the Treasure Hunter, who will reveal his true form and initiate a boss fight.
